TopicTitle: KSP isn't loading after I downloaded it.

Articles.Content:
Whenever I try to load up KSP on Steam, it just shows me a prompt that says 'An error occurred while updating Kerbal Space Program (missing executable)'

I'm not sure what went wrong here. I've tried redownloading the game multiple times but it always comes up with the same prompt.

reboot and try again.

then check your av logs there maybe something in there.

12 hours ago, combusting_jelly said:

missing executable

oh, then that means that its has all the files but no launcher.

Try again, and I also saw that they are having trouble with the laucher.
